9 float ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(float degrees)
10 {
11  float radians = degrees / 180 * M_PI;
12  return radians;
13 }

21 float ba_helper::ConvertQuaternionToAngle(geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat)
22 {
23  float axis = 0;
24  axis += quat.x * quat.x;
25  axis += quat.y * quat.y;
26  axis += quat.z * quat.z;
27  axis = std::sqrt(axis);
28  return 2 * std::atan2(axis, quat.w);
29 }

37 float ba_helper::CalculateGripperParameterFromDesiredAirgap(float airgap)
38 {
39  float result = -5.40444426 * airgap + 0.71065;
40  if (result > 0.7)
41  {
42  result = 0.7;
43  }
44  if (result < 0.0)
45  {
46  result = 0.0;
47  }
48  return result;
49 }

56 geometry_msgs::Point ba_helper::GetCurrentArmbaseLocation(void)
57 {
58  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped manipulator_base_map = GetCurrentPoseInMapFrame(ARM_BASE_FRAME);
59  return manipulator_base_map.pose.position;

74 geometry_msgs::PoseStamped ba_helper::GetCurrentPoseInMapFrame(const char source_frame[],
75  float x, float y, float z,
76  float roll, float pitch, float yaw)
77 {
78  tf::TransformListener listener;
79 
80  listener.waitForTransform(MAP_FRAME, source_frame, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(3.0));
81  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped current_position_base_frame;
82  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped current_position_map_frame;
83 
84  current_position_base_frame.pose.position.x = x;
85  current_position_base_frame.pose.position.y = y;
86  current_position_base_frame.pose.position.z = z;
87 
88  current_position_base_frame.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(roll, pitch, yaw);
89 
90  current_position_base_frame.header.frame_id = source_frame;
91  current_position_base_frame.header.stamp = ros::Time();
92  listener.transformPose(MAP_FRAME, current_position_base_frame, current_position_map_frame);
93  current_position_map_frame.header.frame_id = MAP_FRAME;
94  current_position_map_frame.header.stamp = ros::Time();
95 
96  return current_position_map_frame;
97 }
